trans-unit.source: Represents access to generic isolated storage capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 代表泛型隔離儲存區功能的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This class is an abstract base class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是抽象的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This class is never instantiated; instead, classes that extend it and represent access to a particular type of isolated storage are used.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別永遠不會具現化;相反地，使用類別加以擴充，可存取特定類型的隔離儲存區。

trans-unit.source: for the right to control policy.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制原則的權限。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStoragePermission" /> class with either restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.
trans-unit.target: 依照指定使用限制或無限制的權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStoragePermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 會建立完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`存取隔離儲存區。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: 用來重新建構權限的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 參數不是有效的使用權限項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter's version number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 參數的版本號碼無效。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 權限的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of isolated storage containment allowed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許的隔離儲存區 (Isolated Storage) 內含項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the quota on the overall size of each user's total store.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定每位使用者之總儲存空間的整體大小配額。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the resource allocated to the user.
trans-unit.target: 配置給使用者的資源大小，以位元組為單位。
